nodes.text: "Thundering" Bozwed was a male Togruta Jedi living during or after the Cold War.

Thundering Bozwed was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever Light side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Thundering Bozwed has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Alderaan alongside other Light Side World Bosses. Though killing him is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible to know the year when his death took place.
